00027 #ifndef __COLOR_H__
00028 #define __COLOR_H__
00029 
00030 #include "osystem.h"
00031 
00032 namespace omega
00033 {
00035         class OMEGA_API Color
00036         {
00037         public:
00038                 const float& operator[](int i) const { return myData[i]; }
00039                 float& operator[](int i) { return myData[i]; }
00040                 float* data() { return (float*)myData; }
00041                 const float* data() const { return (const float*)myData; }
00042 
00043         public:
00044                 static const Color White;
00045                 static const Color Black;
00046                 static const Color Orange;
00047                 static const Color Silver;
00048                 static const Color Gray;
00049                 static const Color Red;
00050                 static const Color Maroon;
00051                 static const Color Yellow;
00052                 static const Color Olive;
00053                 static const Color Lime;
00054                 static const Color Green;
00055                 static const Color Aqua;
00056                 static const Color Teal;
00057                 static const Color Blue;
00058                 static const Color Navy;
00059                 static const Color Fuchsia;
00060                 static const Color Purple;
00061 
00062         public:
00063                 Color(float r = 1.0f, float g = 1.0f, float b = 1.0f, float a = 1.0f)
00064                 {
00065                         myData[0] = r;
00066                         myData[1] = g;
00067                         myData[2] = b;
00068                         myData[3] = a;
00069                 }
00070 
00071                 Color scale(float f, bool alpha = false) { return Color(myData[0] * f, myData[1] * f, myData[2] * f, alpha ? myData[3] * f : myData[3]); }
00072         private:
00073                 float myData[4];
00074         };
00075 }; // namespace omega
00076 
00077 #endif
